title: Snowdown Shop
body: When you already have two Garen skins and the snowdown shop discounts two other Garen skins. Adding on to that is that I havent played Garen in ages.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: Both the good discounts on mine were Xin Zhao skins, and I already have a better one for him. The only skin I wouldn't mind having (El tigre braum) was only a 20% discount.
i got challenger ahri skin that wont even let me buy, it says try again every time....{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Well i got a braum skin in mine. I dont even own braum
